name: Mimic - An App to Support English Learning Using Voice
description: Mimic is a web service that supports English learning through the use of voice. It automatically converts uploaded audio into text and offers an interactive feature that allows users to click and select words. This enables efficient English learning by utilizing audio. Additionally, the service includes a feature to mimic and record audio, which significantly enhances pronunciation and listening skills.
